metadata.titleEn: Moho depth and VP / VS of Dahutang
metadata.description:
The data set is mainly shown in the article https://doi.org/10.1016/j.pepi.2020.106617, which includes the distribution of the average thickness of the crust and the average Vp/Vs ratio of the crust based on the h-kappa stacking of the P-wave receiver functions on 42 stations near the Dahutang mining area in Jiangxi Province.
The dataset contains 1 file in DAT format: Dahutang_ moho_ vpvs.dat。
The data set can be used to show the Moho undulation feature of the Dahutang mining area, perspective the transverse distribution characteristics of crust and crustal wave velocity ratio in Dahutang polymetallic metallogenic area, and then discuss the difference of average composition of crust inside and outside the mining area.
metadata.descriptionCn:
数据集主要展示在文章https://doi.org/10.1016/j.pepi.2020.106617的研究中，包含了利用布设在江西大湖塘矿区附近的42个台站P波接收函数h-kappa叠加得到的地壳平均厚度以及地壳平均波速比的分布。
数据集包含格式为dat的文件一共1个：Dahutang_moho_vpvs.dat。
该数据集主要可用来展示大湖塘矿区的莫霍面起伏特征，透视大湖塘多金属成矿区域地壳以及地壳波速比的横向分布特征，进而探讨矿区内外地壳平均组分的差异性。
metadata.instructions:
Data naming: average crustal thickness and Vp/Vs are stored in text format, and the file name is "Dahutang"_ moho_  vpvs.dat”。
Data reading mode: all ASCII files in the data set can be directly opened with text editing software. The main contents: the first column station name, the second column crustal thickness (km), the third column VP / VS, the fourth column crustal thickness estimation error, the fifth column Vp/Vs error, the sixth column station longitude, the seventh column station latitude, the third column VP / vs error, the fifth column VP / vs error, the sixth column station longitude, the seventh column station latitude, Column 8 quality control mark (1: Good; 2: Not Bad;  3: Bad)。
metadata.instructionsCn:
数据命名：平均地壳厚度和Vp/Vs以文本格式存储，文件的名称为“ Dahutang_ moho_ vpvs.dat”。
数据读取方式：该数据集中所有的ASCII码文件都可以直接使用文本编辑软件打开，主体内容分别为：第一列台站名，第二列地壳厚度(km)，第三列Vp/Vs，第四列地壳厚度估计的误差，第五列Vp/Vs的误差，第六列台站经度(degree)，第七列台站纬度(degree)，第八列质量控制标志(1: Good; 2: Not Bad; 3: Bad)。

background: The Dahutang deposit is a newly discovered giant W-Cu-Mo deposit, which is located in the central part of the Jiangnan Orogen, South China. It is well accepted that this deposit is related with the magmatism in Yanshanian movement. During this period, there are widely distributed granites in South China. Ye et al. (2016) believed that the rock and ore-forming processes at Dahutang deposit are under a geodynamic setting of lithospheric thinning and extension based on the U–Pb Geochronology. This process is consistent with the large-scale tungsten ‑ tin polymetallic mineralization in the Qinhang metallogenic belt (~2000 km length, 70 – 30 km in width), South China. Fluid intrusion and oxygen fugacity are widely accepted as two important factors to affect the final mineralization in Dahutang according to the geochemical analysis. Combined with previous geochronological studies on magmatism and mineralization, the recent study showed that the multiphase magmatism and continuous accumulation of mineralization for a long period of time (151 – 130 Ma) have contributed to the formation of the giant Dahutang deposit. The Dahutang deposit is located in the central part of Jiangnan orogen, which is believed to result from the collision between the Yangtze and Cathaysia blocks during the Neoproterozoic period. Later on, this region reactivated at the Mesozoic due to the Paleo-pacific subduction. The granites outcrop in this region could be divided into two main periods, the Neoproterozoic granite and Yanshanian granite. The sedimentary rocks at Dahutang deposit include Neoproterozoic Shuangqiaoshan Group with metamorphosed turbiditic sandstone interbeds. The Neoproterozoic Jiuling biotite granodiorite is covered by Quaternary sediment and outcrop only in South Dahutang deposit.
research objective: In order to better understand the metallogenic mechanism at Dahutang region, we deployed a dense seismic array and then performed the seismic image to get the deep structure. In order to reveal the deep structure and better understand the mineralization in Dahutang region, we deployed a dense array cutting across the deposit. The possible mechanism for the formation of the Dahutang deposit is proposed based on previous frameworks and our new result.
challenges: However, the deep structure of Dahutang deposit is still unknown, and the reason for such a rare 20 m.y. long-lived multiphase magmatism and successive mineralization is puzzled. There are several large scale geophysical investigations in South China, including active seismic profile, ambient noise tomography, receiver function, density inversion from gravity and seismic constraints, and joint inversion of receiver function and gravity anomaly, but they have low resolution at Dahutang district. Even Yao et al. (2013b) performed the gravity explosion on the distribution of intrusive rocks at shallow depth; there are no geophysical observations with special attention on the deep structure beneath Dahutang deposit.
methods: We deployed a dense seismic array and then performed the seismic image to get the deep structure, including the ambient noise tomography, receiver function calculation, H- κ stacking and joint inversion of receiver function and surface wave dispersion. We deployed a linear dense seismic array in Oct 2018, with the trend oriented in NW-SE direction that cut across the main geological units. The P wave receiver function and short period group dispersion were measured based on this data. We follow the common data procedure developed by Bensen et al. (2007) to calculate cross-correlations. Fast Marching Surface Tomography (FMST) is applied to invert the mixed path Rayleigh wave group velocity. CPS330 program gives a linear algorithm to do the S-wave velocity inversion. P wave receiver-function image and H –κ stacking technique provide insightful tools to analyze discontinuities.
dataset: This array includes 50 three-component short-period portable seismographs (QS-05A, with 120 Hz-10 s bandwidth; marked by the light blue triangles in Fig. 1 b), and the distance interval is ~2 km. We finally got the data from 47 stations, and the average duration of the seismic stations is 14 days. The long period dispersion data comes from an ambient noise tomography of China, which involves more than 2000 stations and the resolution of group velocity in South China is 50 km.
findings: The seismic image and gravity anomaly show a low velocity in the upper crust, high velocity in the middle-lower crust, relatively high Vp/Vs ratio, and low gravity anomaly beneath the Dahutang deposit. These features may indicate the process of mineralization: under the context of lithospheric extension and thinning in the Late Mesozoic, there are some magma underplating and melting the lower crust. The hot melts migrated upward and differentiated, the dense component cooled in the middle-lower crust to form the high velocity zones. The light component intruded into the Neoproterozoic granite and formed the Mesozoic granite, providing the heat and material source for the further enrichment of tungsten ‑ copper polymetallic ore.
backgroundCn: 大虎塘矿床是一个新发现的巨型钨-铜-钼矿床，位于中国南方的江南造山带中部。普遍认为该矿床与燕山运动期间的岩浆活动有关。在此期间，南方地区广泛分布着花岗岩。叶等（2016）认为，大虎塘矿床的岩石和成矿过程是在岩石圈变薄和扩张的地球动力学背景下进行的，这一过程与南方秦汉成矿带（约2000公里长，70-30公里宽）的大规模钨-锡多金属成矿相一致。根据地球化学分析，流体侵入和氧逸度被广泛接受为影响大虎塘最终成矿的两个重要因素。结合之前关于岩浆活动和成矿的年代学研究，最近的研究表明，多个阶段的岩浆活动和长时间（151-130百万年）的成矿持续积累促成了巨型大虎塘矿床的形成。大虎塘矿床位于江南造山带的中央部分，据信是由于扬子块和华夏块在新元古代期间的碰撞所导致。此后，由于古太平洋的俯冲，该地区在中生代重新激活。该地区出露的花岗岩可分为两个主要时期：新元古代花岗岩和燕山期花岗岩。大虎塘矿床的沉积岩包括新元古代的双桥山组，具有变质的浊积砂岩夹层。新元古代的九岭黑云母花岗闪长岩被第四纪沉积物覆盖，仅在大虎塘矿床的南部出露。
research objectiveCn: 为了更好地理解大虎塘地区的成矿机制，我们部署了一个密集的地震阵列，并进行了地震成像以获取深部结构。为了揭示深部结构并更好地理解大虎塘地区的矿化，我们部署了一个穿过矿床的密集阵列。基于之前的框架和我们的新结果，提出了大虎塘矿床形成的可能机制。
challengesCn: 然而，Dahutang 矿床的深部结构仍然未知，持续长达 20 万年的多阶段岩浆活动和连续矿化的原因令人困惑。在中国南方进行了一些大规模的地球物理调查，包括主动地震剖面、环境噪声成像、接收函数、基于重力和地震约束的密度反演，以及接收函数和重力异常的联合反演，但在 Dahutang 地区的分辨率较低。即使 Yao 等人（2013b）对浅层侵入岩的分布进行了重力爆炸研究，但仍然没有特别关注 Dahutang 矿床深部结构的地球物理观测。
methodsCn: 我们部署了一个密集的地震阵列，然后进行了地震成像，以获取深部结构，包括环境噪声层析成像、接收函数计算、H-κ堆叠以及接收函数与表面波色散的联合反演。我们在2018年10月部署了一条线性密集地震阵列，趋势朝NW-SE方向，穿过主要地质单元。基于这些数据测量了P波接收函数和短周期群速度色散。我们遵循Bensen等人（2007）开发的常规数据处理程序来计算互相关。应用快速行进表面层析成像（FMST）反演混合路径瑞利波群速度。CPS330程序提供了一种线性算法来进行S波速度反演。P波接收函数图像和H-κ堆叠技术为分析不连续面提供了有价值的工具。
datasetCn: 该数组包括50个三分量短周期便携式地震仪（QS-05A，带宽为120 Hz-10 s；在图1 b中用浅蓝色三角形标记），距离间隔约为2公里。我们最终获得了47个站点的数据，地震站的平均持续时间为14天。长周期色散数据来自中国的环境噪声层析成像，涉及2000多个站点，南中国的群速度分辨率为50公里。
findingsCn: 地震图像和重力异常显示，在大虎塘矿床下方，上层地壳存在低速度，中下层地壳则存在高速度，相对较高的Vp/Vs比率和低重力异常。这些特征可能表明矿化过程：在晚中生代的岩石圈延展和变薄背景下，存在一些岩浆底侵并熔融下地壳。热熔体向上迁移并发生分异，密度较大的成分在中下地壳冷却形成高速度区。轻成分侵入到新元古代花岗岩中，形成了中生代花岗岩，为进一步富集钨-铜多金属矿提供了热源和物质来源。

Verification.QuestionEn: Is a dense seismic array a valid method for collecting data to understand deep structures related to mineralization?
Verification.QuestionCn: 密集的地震阵列是一种有效的方法，用于收集数据以理解与矿化相关的深部结构吗？

Verification.QuestionEn: Can the H-κ stacking method be used to accurately analyze discontinuities in geological structures?
Verification.QuestionCn: H-κ堆叠方法可以用于准确分析地质结构中的不连续性吗？

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the deployment of short-period portable seismographs provide reliable data for seismic imaging in the Dahutang region?
Verification.QuestionCn: 短期便携式地震仪的部署是否为大虎塘地区的地震成像提供可靠数据？

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used to study the deep structure beneath a mineral deposit area?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于研究矿床区域下方深层结构的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used to study the deep structure beneath a mineral deposit area involves deploying a dense seismic array to perform seismic imaging, which includes techniques such as ambient noise tomography, receiver function calculation, H-κ stacking, and joint inversion of receiver function and surface wave dispersion.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于研究矿床区域下方深部结构的数据收集方法的一个例子是部署密集的地震阵列进行地震成像，其中包括环境噪声层析成像、接收函数计算、H-κ叠加以及接收函数与表面波色散的联合反演等技术。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when investigating the deep structure of a mineral deposit?
Example.QuestionCn: 在调查矿床的深部结构时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge faced when investigating the deep structure of a mineral deposit is the lack of high-resolution geophysical observations specifically focused on the deep structure beneath the deposit, despite large-scale geophysical investigations like active seismic profiles and joint inversion techniques being conducted in the region.
Example.AnswerCn: 在调查矿床深部结构时面临的一个挑战是，尽管在该地区进行了大规模的地球物理调查，如主动地震剖面和联合反演技术，但仍缺乏专门针对矿床下方深部结构的高分辨率地球物理观测。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What features of the geological structure are identified through joint inversion techniques in seismic studies?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 在地震研究中，通过联合反演技术识别出的地质结构特征有哪些？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: low velocity in the upper crust, high velocity in the middle-lower crust, relatively high Vp/Vs ratio, low gravity anomaly
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 上地壳低速，中下地壳高速，相对较高的Vp/Vs比，低重力异常。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What properties of the crust are studied using the H-κ stacking method in seismic data analysis?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: H-κ叠加方法在地震数据分析中研究地壳的哪些属性？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: average crustal thickness, average crustal velocity ratio (Vp/Vs)
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 平均地壳厚度，平均地壳速度比（Vp/Vs）

Definition.QuestionEn: What does 'P wave receiver function' mean in the context of seismic data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: 'P波接收函数'在地震数据收集的背景下是什么意思？
Definition.AnswerEn: In the context of seismic data collection, 'P wave receiver function' refers to a technique used to analyze the seismic waves generated by earthquakes to infer the structure of the Earth's crust and upper mantle. It involves calculating the response of the Earth's crust to P waves, which are primary or compressional waves, to identify discontinuities and variations in seismic velocity.
Definition.AnswerCn: 在地震数据收集的背景下，“P波接收函数”指的是一种分析地震波（由地震产生）以推断地壳和上地幔结构的技术。它涉及计算地壳对P波（即主要或压缩波）的响应，以识别不连续面和地震速度的变化。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How do the data collection methods for seismic imaging using a dense array compare to those used in ambient noise tomography for understanding the deep structure of mineral deposits?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 密集阵列的地震成像数据收集方法与用于环境噪声层析成像以理解矿床深部结构的方法相比，如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The data collection methods for seismic imaging using a dense array involve deploying a linear dense seismic array with three-component short-period portable seismographs to measure P wave receiver function and short-period group dispersion. In contrast, ambient noise tomography involves using a broader network of stations to capture long period dispersion data, with the resolution of group velocity being significantly larger. The dense array provides higher resolution for analyzing local deep structures, while ambient noise tomography offers a broader regional perspective.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 用于地震成像的数据收集方法涉及部署线性密集地震阵列，使用三分量短周期便携式地震仪测量P波接收函数和短周期群体色散。相比之下，环境噪声层析成像则涉及使用更广泛的台站网络来捕捉长周期色散数据，群体速度的分辨率显著较大。密集阵列提供了更高的分辨率，以分析局部深部结构，而环境噪声层析成像则提供了更广泛的区域视角。

Comparison.QuestionEn: How does the resolution of data collected from a dense seismic array compare to that from previous large-scale geophysical investigations in the same region?
Comparison.QuestionCn: 密集地震阵列收集的数据的分辨率与该地区之前的大规模地球物理调查相比如何？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The resolution of data collected from a dense seismic array is higher than that from previous large-scale geophysical investigations, which include methods like active seismic profile and ambient noise tomography. The dense array, with its closely spaced seismographs, offers detailed insights into local deep structures, while large-scale investigations provide broader, less detailed regional data. This increased resolution allows for more precise analysis of the mineral deposit's deep structure, which was not possible with previous lower-resolution methods.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 从密集地震阵列收集的数据的分辨率高于之前的大规模地球物理调查，包括主动地震剖面和环境噪声成像。密集阵列通过紧密间隔的地震仪提供了对局部深部结构的详细洞察，而大规模调查则提供了更广泛、但细节较少的区域数据。这种分辨率的提高使得对矿床深部结构的更精确分析成为可能，而这是之前低分辨率方法无法实现的。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What insights can be drawn about subsurface geological structures from the application of P wave receiver function and ambient noise tomography in a dataset?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 通过应用P波接收函数和环境噪声成像技术，可以对地下地质结构获得哪些见解？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The application of P wave receiver function and ambient noise tomography can reveal low velocity zones in the upper crust and high velocity zones in the middle-lower crust, indicating processes such as magma underplating, melting, and differentiation. These insights suggest the movement of hot melts upward, cooling of dense components, and intrusion of lighter components, which are crucial for understanding mineralization processes.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: P波接收函数和环境噪声成像的应用可以揭示上地壳中的低速区和中下地壳中的高速区，指示出如岩浆底板、熔融和分异等过程。这些见解表明热熔体向上移动、密集成分的冷却以及轻成分的侵入，这对于理解矿化过程至关重要。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How can the deployment of a dense seismic array across geological units contribute to our understanding of mineralization in a region?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 在地质单元上部署密集的地震阵列如何有助于我们理解一个地区的矿化过程？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: Deploying a dense seismic array can provide detailed seismic images of the deep structure beneath mineral deposits. This approach allows for high-resolution data collection that can reveal velocity anomalies and structural discontinuities, offering insights into the processes such as lithospheric extension, magma underplating, and the formation of ore deposits.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 部署密集的地震阵列可以提供矿床下深部结构的详细地震图像。这种方法允许高分辨率的数据收集，能够揭示速度异常和结构不连续性，从而提供对岩石圈延展、岩浆底部堆积和矿床形成等过程的洞察。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the challenges in obtaining high-resolution geophysical data in regions like Dahutang?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在像大虎塘这样的地区，获取高分辨率地球物理数据面临的挑战包括哪些因素？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The challenges in obtaining high-resolution geophysical data in regions like Dahutang are due to the low resolution of existing geophysical investigations at the district level, despite several large-scale studies in South China. The absence of focused geophysical observations on the deep structure beneath the Dahutang deposit also contributes to these challenges.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在像大虎塘这样的地区，获取高分辨率地球物理数据的挑战在于现有的地球物理调查在区级的分辨率较低，尽管在华南地区进行了一些大规模研究。缺乏对大虎塘矿床下深部结构的专门地球物理观测也加剧了这些挑战。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: Why is it necessary to deploy dense seismic arrays when investigating the deep structure of mineral-rich regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在研究富矿区的深部结构时，部署密集的地震阵列是必要的原因是什么？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Deploying dense seismic arrays is necessary to reveal the deep structure and better understand the mineralization in regions like Dahutang. These arrays provide detailed seismic imaging, which helps in analyzing discontinuities and understanding the geodynamic settings that contribute to mineralization processes.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 部署密集的地震阵列对于揭示深部结构和更好地理解像大虎塘这样的地区的矿化是必要的。这些阵列提供详细的地震成像，有助于分析不连续性并理解促成矿化过程的地球动力学背景。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What causes the complexity in understanding the multiphase magmatism and mineralization over long periods in areas like Dahutang?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在像大虎塘这样的地区，理解长期的多相岩浆活动和矿化过程的复杂性是什么原因？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The complexity arises from the unknown deep structure and the rare occurrence of 20 million years long-lived multiphase magmatism and successive mineralization. Although there are existing geophysical investigations, they lack the resolution and focus needed to unravel these complex geological processes.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 复杂性源于未知的深层结构以及长达2000万年的多相岩浆活动和连续矿化的罕见发生。尽管已有现有的地球物理调查，但它们缺乏揭示这些复杂地质过程所需的分辨率和重点。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential outcomes of deploying a dense seismic array across a mineral deposit area in terms of understanding the deep structure?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在矿床区域部署密集的地震阵列在理解深部结构方面的潜在结果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Deploying a dense seismic array can result in detailed seismic imaging, revealing the deep structure of the region. This may provide insights into low and high velocity zones, which could indicate processes such as magma underplating and mineralization under lithospheric extension and thinning conditions.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 部署密集的地震阵列可以实现详细的地震成像，揭示该地区的深部结构。这可能提供对低速和高速区域的洞察，这些区域可能表明在岩石圈延展和变薄条件下的岩浆底部和矿化过程。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What is the primary objective of deploying a dense seismic array in the Dahutang region?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在大虎塘地区部署密集地震阵列的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objective of deploying a dense seismic array in the Dahutang region is to better understand the metallogenic mechanism by obtaining a seismic image to reveal the deep structure. This aids in comprehending the mineralization processes and proposing mechanisms for the formation of the Dahutang deposit based on the new seismic data and previous frameworks.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 在大虎塘地区部署密集地震阵列的主要目的是通过获取地震图像来揭示深部结构，从而更好地理解成矿机制。这有助于理解矿化过程，并基于新的地震数据和先前的框架提出大虎塘矿床形成的机制。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to perform joint inversion of receiver function and surface wave dispersion in geophysical studies?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在地球物理研究中，联合反演接收函数和表面波色散的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Performing joint inversion of receiver function and surface wave dispersion is important because it provides comprehensive insights into the subsurface structure, offering high-resolution data that can help identify features such as discontinuities. This approach is crucial for understanding the deep structure beneath complex geological areas like the Dahutang deposit.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 联合反演接收函数和表面波色散是重要的，因为它提供了对地下结构的全面洞察，提供了高分辨率的数据，可以帮助识别诸如不连续面等特征。这种方法对于理解像大虎塘矿床这样复杂地质区域下方的深部结构至关重要。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What procedures are involved in deploying a dense seismic array to obtain seismic imagery for deep structure analysis in geological research?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 部署密集地震阵列以获取深部结构分析的地震影像在地质研究中涉及哪些程序？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: To deploy a dense seismic array for deep structure analysis, a linear dense seismic array is set up with seismographs arranged in a specified orientation, such as NW-SE, to intersect main geological units. The array includes multiple three-component short-period portable seismographs, and data is collected over a set duration. Techniques like ambient noise tomography, receiver function calculation, H-κ stacking, and joint inversion of receiver function and surface wave dispersion are used to process the data and produce seismic images.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 为了进行深部结构分析，部署了一个密集的地震阵列，设置了一个线性密集地震阵列，地震仪按照指定的方向（如西北-东南）排列，以交叉主要地质单元。该阵列包括多个三分量短周期便携式地震仪，并在设定的时间内收集数据。使用环境噪声成像、接收函数计算、H-κ叠加以及接收函数与表面波色散的联合反演等技术处理数据，生成地震图像。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What technological advancements and instruments enabled the deployment of a dense seismic array for studying the deep structure of mineralization regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 哪些技术进步和仪器使得部署密集的地震阵列以研究矿化区域的深部结构成为可能？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The deployment of a dense seismic array was enabled by advancements in seismic instruments, such as the use of three-component short-period portable seismographs (QS-05A, with 120 Hz-10 s bandwidth), which allowed for detailed data collection across multiple stations with a distance interval of approximately 2 km.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 密集地震阵列的部署得益于地震仪器的进步，例如使用三分量短周期便携式地震仪（QS-05A，带宽为120 Hz-10 s），这使得在多个站点之间以大约2公里的距离间隔进行详细数据收集成为可能。

Enablement.QuestionEn: What conditions or factors led to the need for deploying a dense seismic array across geological units in mineral-rich regions?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 导致在矿产资源丰富地区部署密集地震阵列的条件或因素是什么？
Enablement.AnswerEn: The need for deploying a dense seismic array was driven by the unknown deep structure of mineral-rich regions and the lack of high-resolution geophysical observations. Existing large-scale investigations had low resolution, prompting the deployment to better understand the multiphase magmatism and mineralization processes.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 部署密集地震阵列的需求是由于矿产资源丰富地区深部结构未知以及缺乏高分辨率地球物理观测。现有的大规模调查分辨率较低，因此需要部署密集地震阵列，以更好地理解多相岩浆活动和矿化过程。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might a dense seismic array be expected to yield detailed insights into the deep structure beneath a mineral deposit?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 密集的地震阵列可能会提供关于矿床下深部结构的详细见解，原因是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: A dense seismic array captures high-resolution data that enables detailed seismic imaging, which can reveal deep structural features such as discontinuities, velocity anomalies, and layering beneath a mineral deposit. This is achieved through techniques like ambient noise tomography and receiver function analysis, which are enhanced by the dense spatial coverage of the array.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 一个密集的地震阵列捕获高分辨率数据，使得能够进行详细的地震成像，从而揭示矿床下方的深层结构特征，如不连续面、速度异常和分层。这是通过环境噪声层析成像和接收函数分析等技术实现的，这些技术通过阵列的密集空间覆盖得到了增强。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What could be the reasons for the low resolution of existing geophysical investigations at certain districts, even with several large-scale studies conducted?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 即使进行了一些大规模研究，某些地区现有地球物理调查的分辨率低的原因可能是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Existing geophysical investigations might have low resolution due to factors like insufficient station density, limited duration of data collection, or the methods used, which may not be sensitive enough to detect smaller scale features or deep structures. Additionally, the complexity of geological formations and the specific focus of previous studies might not have been tailored to the unique characteristics of certain districts.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 现有的地球物理调查可能由于站点密度不足、数据收集时间有限或所使用的方法可能对较小规模特征或深部结构的敏感性不足而导致分辨率较低。此外，地质构造的复杂性以及以往研究的具体重点可能未能针对某些地区的独特特征进行量身定制。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might the average duration of seismic station deployment be crucial for capturing comprehensive data in seismological studies?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 平均地震站部署的持续时间为何对捕捉地震学研究中的全面数据至关重要？
Expectation.AnswerEn: The average duration of seismic station deployment is crucial because it affects the ability to capture a wide range of seismic events and ambient noise data necessary for accurate imaging and velocity analysis. Longer durations allow for the collection of more comprehensive datasets, which improve the reliability and resolution of the resulting seismic images and the interpretation of deep crustal structures.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 地震站部署的平均持续时间至关重要，因为它影响捕捉广泛的地震事件和必要的环境噪声数据的能力，这些数据对于准确成像和速度分析至关重要。更长的持续时间允许收集更全面的数据集，从而提高最终地震图像的可靠性和分辨率，以及对深地壳结构的解释。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How would you evaluate the effectiveness of using dense seismic arrays for understanding the deep structure and mineralization processes in geological regions?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估使用密集地震阵列来理解地质区域的深部结构和矿化过程的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Dense seismic arrays are effective for understanding deep structures and mineralization processes because they provide high-resolution seismic images and insights into the crust's velocity and density variations, as shown by the deployment around the Dahutang deposit.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 密集的地震阵列对于理解深部结构和矿化过程非常有效，因为它们提供了高分辨率的地震图像以及对地壳速度和密度变化的洞察，正如在大虎塘矿床周围的部署所示。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In what ways might the challenges of low-resolution geophysical investigations in specific districts be addressed to improve the accuracy of geological studies?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在特定地区，如何解决低分辨率地球物理调查的挑战，以提高地质研究的准确性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Challenges of low-resolution geophysical investigations can be addressed by deploying more localized and dense seismic arrays, as well as integrating multiple methods like ambient noise tomography and receiver function calculations to enhance the resolution and accuracy of geological studies, particularly in regions like the Dahutang district.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 低分辨率地球物理调查的挑战可以通过部署更局部和密集的地震阵列，以及整合多种方法，如环境噪声成像和接收函数计算，来提高地质研究的分辨率和准确性，特别是在大虎塘地区。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: What potential advancements or refinements in data collection methods could be explored to better differentiate crustal components and mineralization features in complex geological settings?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 在复杂地质环境中，可以探索哪些潜在的进展或改进的数据收集方法，以更好地区分地壳成分和矿化特征？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Advancements in data collection methods could include the use of joint inversion techniques combining receiver function and surface wave dispersion data, as well as developments in seismic imaging technologies to better differentiate crustal components and mineralization features in complex settings like those observed in the Dahutang region.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法的进展可能包括结合接收函数和表面波色散数据的联合反演技术，以及在复杂环境（如大虎塘地区）中更好地区分地壳成分和矿化特征的地震成像技术的发展。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how the deployment of a dense seismic array contributes to revealing the deep structure in the Dahutang region.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白密集地震阵列的部署如何有助于揭示大虎塘地区的深部结构。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The deployment of a dense seismic array allows researchers to perform seismic imaging techniques such as ambient noise tomography, receiver function calculation, and H-κ stacking. These methods help to analyze and visualize the deep geological structures, providing insights into the mineralization processes at the Dahutang deposit.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 密集的地震阵列的部署使研究人员能够执行诸如环境噪声成像、接收函数计算和H-κ叠加等地震成像技术。这些方法有助于分析和可视化深层地质结构，为大虎塘矿床的矿化过程提供洞察。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of why the deep structure of the Dahutang deposit remains unknown despite several large-scale geophysical investigations.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解为什么大虎塘矿床的深部结构仍然未知，尽管进行了几次大规模的地球物理调查。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Despite numerous geophysical investigations in South China, including active seismic profiles and ambient noise tomography, the resolution of these methods has been low in the Dahutang district. This has left the deep structure beneath the Dahutang deposit largely unexplored, necessitating more precise and focused studies like the deployment of dense seismic arrays.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 尽管在南中国进行了大量地球物理调查，包括主动地震剖面和环境噪声成像，但在大湖塘地区这些方法的分辨率较低。这使得大湖塘矿床下的深部结构尚未得到充分探讨，因此需要更精确和针对性的研究，例如部署密集的地震阵列。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I'm unsure how the P wave receiver function and short period group dispersion measurements are processed to yield useful data.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不确定P波接收函数和短周期群体色散测量是如何处理以产生有用数据的。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The P wave receiver function and short period group dispersion measurements are processed using established procedures, such as those developed by Bensen et al., to calculate cross-correlations. These data processing techniques, along with Fast Marching Surface Tomography and S-wave velocity inversion, facilitate the creation of seismic images that reveal discontinuities and other significant geological features.
Assertion.AnswerCn: P波接收函数和短周期群体色散测量采用Bensen等人开发的既定程序进行处理，以计算交叉相关。这些数据处理技术，以及快速行进表面层析成像和S波速度反演，促进了地震图像的创建，揭示了不连续性和其他重要的地质特征。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please summarize the challenges faced in achieving high-resolution geophysical observations in complex geological regions and suggest potential solutions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn:
在复杂地质区域实现高分辨率地球物理观测面临的挑战包括：地质结构的多样性和不均匀性、信号噪声的干扰、测量设备的限制、数据处理和解释的复杂性，以及环境因素的影响。 

潜在的解决方案包括：采用先进的测量技术和设备、提高数据采集的密度和覆盖范围、应用机器学习和人工智能技术进行数据处理和分析、加强多学科合作以整合不同领域的知识，以及进行长期监测以获取更全面的数据。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: The main challenge in achieving high-resolution geophysical observations in complex regions like the Dahutang district is the low resolution of existing large-scale geophysical investigations. While techniques such as active seismic profiles, ambient noise tomography, receiver function, density inversion from gravity, and joint inversion of receiver function and gravity anomaly have been employed, they often lack sufficient resolution. One potential solution is the deployment of a dense seismic array, as was done in Dahutang, to obtain detailed seismic images and better understand the deep structures. This approach can provide more precise data on crustal composition and mineralization processes.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 在复杂地区如大虎塘地区，实现高分辨率地球物理观测的主要挑战是现有大规模地球物理调查的分辨率较低。虽然已经采用了主动地震剖面、环境噪声层析成像、接收函数、重力密度反演以及接收函数与重力异常的联合反演等技术，但它们往往缺乏足够的分辨率。一个潜在的解决方案是部署密集的地震阵列，正如在大虎塘所做的那样，以获取详细的地震图像，更好地理解深部结构。这种方法可以提供关于地壳组成和矿化过程的更精确数据。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the potential for expanding dataset collection to cover broader geophysical parameters and its implications for understanding mineralization in geological regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨扩大数据集收集以涵盖更广泛的地球物理参数的潜力，以及这对理解地质区域矿化的影响。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Expanding dataset collection to include broader geophysical parameters can significantly enhance the understanding of mineralization processes. In the Dahutang region, the dataset is primarily focused on seismic data obtained through a dense array. To broaden this understanding, additional data such as gravity, magnetic, and electromagnetic measurements could be integrated. This would allow for a more comprehensive view of the subsurface features, helping to identify variations in crustal composition and the processes leading to mineralization. The integration of these datasets could also improve the resolution of models and provide insights into the geodynamic settings influencing mineral formation.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 扩展数据集收集以包括更广泛的地球物理参数，可以显著增强对矿化过程的理解。在大虎塘地区，数据集主要集中在通过密集阵列获得的地震数据。为了拓宽这一理解，可以整合重力、磁力和电磁测量等额外数据。这将有助于更全面地了解地下特征，帮助识别地壳成分的变化以及导致矿化的过程。这些数据集的整合还可以提高模型的分辨率，并提供对影响矿物形成的地球动力学背景的洞察。
